sentences.en: a hybrid of wheat and rye
Air-entraining agent increases impermeability of hybrid fiber concrete.
sentences.cn: 引气剂有助于提高混杂纤维混凝土的抗渗性。

sentences.en: All the Pomoideae were allopolyploids drived from a doubled hybrid between two remote ancestral types.
sentences.cn: 所有的梨亚科是由两个远缘祖先类型双杂交演化的异源多倍体.

sentences.en: Hybrid cars can go almost 600 miles between refueling.
sentences.cn: 混合动力车加一次油可以跑几乎600英里。

sentences.en: Hypergolic ignition systems bear many resemblances to hybrid rockets.
sentences.cn: 自然式点火系统在很多方面与混合型火箭相似.

sentences.en: Indeed, experience with the legislatively imposed hybrid procedures has not been encouraging.
sentences.cn: 的确, 立法规定的混合型程序的经历并不令人感到鼓舞.

sentences.en: Its populace was a hybrid assortment.
sentences.cn: 这里的居民是个大杂烩.

sentences.en: Its proposed signal is a hybrid, part analog and part digital.
sentences.cn: 其拟议中的信号是一种部分模拟与部分数字的混合波导联结.

sentences.en: Nevertheless, they readily found a variety of other legal bases for imposing hybrid rulemaking procedures.
sentences.cn: 但不管怎样, 法院很快找出了各种其他的法律根据以规定混合型规则制定程序.

sentences.en: Reviewing courts were among the most active proponents of hybrid rulemaking procedures.
sentences.cn: 复审法院是最积极的混合型规则制定程序的建议者.

sentences.en: Scientists have bred new hybrid plants and animals which yield more food.
sentences.cn: 科学家培育的许多新的杂交植物和动物,提供了更多的食物.

sentences.en: Solid propellant engine systems are basically less flexible in operation than liquid or hybrid propellant systems.
sentences.cn: 固体推进剂发动机系统的可调性基本上比液体或混合型的要差.

sentences.en: That is a hybrid perpetual rose.
sentences.cn: 那是一株杂交的四季开花的蔷薇.

sentences.en: These compromise procedures were generally described as " hybrid rulemaking. "
sentences.cn: 这些妥协的程序一般波形容为: 混合型规则制定 ".

sentences.en: To meet this goal, a microcomputer controlled hybrid powertrain was designed and built.
sentences.cn: 为了达到这一目标, 设计和制造了微计算机控制的混合式动力装置.

sentences.en: Whatever their legal bases, the hybrid rulemaking requirements generally fell into two broad categories.
sentences.cn: 无论混合型规则制定的法律基础是什么, 其要求条件一般分属两个大范畴.

words.tran_cn: 杂交；配种；[化学] 杂化；杂种培殖

phrases.tran_cn: 混合动力车；双动力汽车

trans.tran_cn: 杂种，杂交生成的生物体，混合物，混合词，混合动力
trans.tran_en: an animal or plant produced from parents of different breeds or types
